# Wealthbox CRM

## Overview
- **Website:** https://www.wealthbox.com
- **Category:** CRM and AI Workspace for Financial Advisors
- **Description:** Modern, cloud-based CRM platform designed specifically for financial advisors and wealth management firms. Features intuitive interface, AI-powered meeting notes, comprehensive integrations with custodians and portfolio management systems, and collaborative workflow automation. Built by Starburst Labs, Inc.
- **Status:** Active
- **Last Updated:** 2026-02-11

## Pricing Tiers

| Tier | Price (Annual) | Price (Monthly) | User Limit | Key Features |
|------|----------------|-----------------|------------|--------------|
| Starter | Not disclosed publicly | Not disclosed publicly | Limited features | Contact Management, 3 Contact Roles, 3 Teams, 1 Opportunity Pipeline, Basic Tasks, 2GB File Storage, 1 Workspace, Mobile App, Basic Support |
| Professional | Not disclosed publicly | Not disclosed publicly | Moderate features | Everything in Starter + 5 Contact Roles, 5 Teams, 3 Opportunity Pipelines, Workflows, Workflow Outcomes, 5GB Storage, Advanced Reports |
| Business | Not disclosed publicly | Not disclosed publicly | Advanced features | Everything in Professional + Unlimited Contact Roles, Unlimited Teams, 5 Opportunity Pipelines, Workflow Milestones, Workflow Template Sharing, Subtasks, Customizable Workflow Actions, Form Builders, 10GB Storage, 5 Workspaces, Charts & Graphs, Customizable Dashboards, AI for Reports |
| Enterprise | Custom | Custom | Unlimited | Everything in Business + Unlimited Pipelines, Unlimited Workspaces, 20GB Storage, Role-Based Homepages, Enterprise SSO, On-Premise Exchange Sync, VPN Support, SFTP Reports & Backups, Admin Export Restrictions, Email Controls, File Storage Controls, Org-wide 2FA Enforcement, Priority Support, Dedicated Account Manager, Integration Permissions, White Glove Implementation |

### Notes on Pricing
- **Pricing Not Public:** Wealthbox does not publish specific dollar amounts on their public pricing page - requires demo/sales contact
- **Free Trial:** 14-day free trial available (no credit card required)
- **Annual vs Monthly:** Pricing structure supports both annual and monthly billing but amounts not disclosed publicly
- **AI Notetaker:** Available as paid add-on across all tiers (pricing not disclosed)
- **Enterprise Features:** Custom pricing with dedicated account manager and white-glove implementation program
- **Migration Assistance:** Free CRM data migration assistance included
- **SOC 2 Compliant:** All tiers include bank-level security and SOC 2 compliance
- **Contact:** Demo requests via website; enterprise demo available at https://www.wealthbox.com/demo/enterprise/
- **Comparison to Redtail:** Wealthbox does not publicly disclose per-user pricing like Redtail ($39-65/user/month), positioning as premium solution requiring sales consultation

## Key Features

### Core Capabilities (All Plans)
- **Contact and Household Management**
  - Centralized client database with household grouping
  - Contact roles for team coordination
  - Custom fields for tailored data capture
  - Tagging and segmentation
  - Advanced search and filtering
  - Activity stream tracking all interactions
- **Task Management**
  - Create and assign tasks linked to contacts
  - Suggested Actions (AI-driven task recommendations)
  - Daily Task Digest
  - Coworker notifications
  - Task linking to opportunities and workflows
- **Calendar Integration**
  - Two-way sync with Google Calendar, Outlook, Apple Calendar, iCal
  - Customizable individual and group calendar views
  - Meeting scheduling and tracking
- **Wealthbox Mail**
  - Two-way email sync (Gmail, Outlook/Exchange, Office 365)
  - Send and receive emails within Wealthbox
  - Email-to-CRM actions (create tasks, events, workflows from email)
  - Individual and shared email accounts
  - Chrome Extension for Gmail integration
  - Bcc email forwarding to capture correspondence
  - Email dropbox for automatic contact linking
  - Click-to-Call functionality from contact records
- **Opportunity Management**
  - Pipeline tracking by stage
  - Kanban board drag-and-drop interface
  - Customizable opportunity stages
  - Graphical views by user, stage, and closing date
  - Notes and status updates
- **Mobile App Companion**
  - iOS and Android support
  - Full CRM access on the go
- **Security & Compliance**
  - Bank-level 256-bit SSL encryption
  - Bcrypt password hashing (cost factor 10)
  - Two-factor authentication (2FA)
  - Session timeout controls
  - Compliant note archiving
  - SOC 2 Type II compliant
  - Data centers: AWS (ISO 27001, SOC 1/2, PCI Level 1, FISMA Moderate certified)
  - Nightly automated backups to multiple physical locations
  - Point-in-time recovery capability
- **Integrations**
  - 100+ partner integrations
  - API development support
  - Zapier connectivity for 2,000+ apps
  - Integrately (1,000+ integrations)
  - Make (formerly Integromat) support

### Advanced Features (Professional & Business Plans)

#### Workflows
- **Automated Workflows**
  - Sequential or checklist-style workflows
  - Customizable templates with coworker commenting
  - Dynamic scheduling with projected due dates
  - Workflow triggers from events (new referral, onboarding, annual review)
  - Team collaboration features
- **Workflow Outcomes** (Professional+)
  - Conditional logic on workflow steps
  - Go to step / restart step / complete workflow actions
  - Flexible branching logic
- **Advanced Workflow Features** (Business+)
  - Workflow Milestones for progress tracking
  - Workflow Template Sharing across teams
  - Subtasks for Workflows
  - Send-To Actions (push data to integrated apps)
  - Customizable Workflow Actions
  - Workflow Form Builders

#### Reporting & Analytics
- **Automated Reports**
  - Pre-built report templates
  - Scheduled report generation
- **Dynamic/Customized Reports** (Professional+)
  - Powerful reports engine with multiple criteria patterns
  - On-demand custom report generation
  - Easy export to Excel/CSV
  - Report Calculations
  - Report Groupings
  - Omniview Reporting (Business+)
- **AI for Reports** (Business+)
  - Generate comprehensive reports from simple prompts
  - Eliminate manual formatting
- **Charts & Graphs** (Business+)
  - Bar, column, line, funnel, donut chart visualizations
- **Customizable Dashboards** (Business+)
  - Firm-wide key metrics at a glance
  - Dashboard sharing with colleagues

#### Meetings Feature
- **Meeting Preparation**
  - Build agendas within Wealthbox
  - Shared notepad for collaboration
  - AI-generated summary of recent client activity for meeting prep
- **Meeting Follow-Up**
  - Concise meeting recaps
  - Professional follow-up email generation
  - Context-aware task suggestions
  - Convert AI-generated "Ideas" into actionable tasks with one click

#### Broadcast Email
- **Bulk Communications**
  - Select multiple contacts by tags
  - Email templates with mail merge
  - Email themes for consistent branding
  - Email open tracking
  - Email link tracking

### Enterprise-Only Features
- **Advanced Administration**
  - Enterprise Single Sign-On (SSO)
  - Organization-wide settings control
  - Admin user analysis and monitoring
  - Admin export restrictions
  - Email controls (compliance oversight)
  - File storage controls
  - Organization-wide 2FA enforcement (beyond workspace-level)
  - Integration permissions management
- **Enterprise Infrastructure**
  - On-Premise Exchange Sync support
  - VPN Support for Exchange Sync
  - SFTP Account Reports & Backups
  - Unlimited Workspaces
  - 20GB file storage per user
  - Customizable role-based homepages
- **Enterprise Support & Implementation**
  - Priority Enterprise Support
  - Dedicated Account Manager
  - White-glove CRM implementation program
  - Migration assistance with dedicated resources
- **Permissions & Visibility**
  - Granular permissions and visibility controls
  - Role-based access at enterprise scale
  - Multi-office support with unified oversight

### Limitations
- **Pricing Transparency:**
  - No public pricing information - requires sales contact for quotes
  - Cannot compare costs without engaging sales process
- **Starter Plan Restrictions:**
  - Limited to 3 contact roles and 3 teams
  - Only 1 opportunity pipeline
  - 2GB storage may be insufficient for document-heavy practices
  - No workflows or advanced automation
- **General Platform Limitations:**
  - Industry-specific (financial services) - not suitable for other verticals
  - AI Notetaker is paid add-on (not included in base plans)
  - Enterprise features require custom pricing
  - Advanced reporting limited to Business+ tiers
  - Document storage caps by tier (vs unlimited in some competitors)
  - No native compliant texting solution (unlike Redtail Speak)
  - API documentation not publicly available (requires partnership)

## Add-On Products & Services

### Wealthbox AI Notetaker
**Embedded AI Meeting Documentation**

- **What it does:** Automatically records, transcribes, and generates actionable meeting notes directly within Wealthbox Meetings feature
- **Key Features:**
  - Embedded directly in platform (no separate login or integration required)
  - Automatic meeting recording and transcription
  - AI-generated actionable notes
  - Instant, accurate meeting recaps
  - Context-aware insights and task suggestions
  - Eliminates manual note-taking
  - AI summary of recent client activity for meeting prep
  - Professional follow-up email generation
  - Convert meeting insights into Wealthbox Tasks with one click
  - Designed specifically for financial advisory conversations
- **Compliance:** Notes automatically archived within Wealthbox's SOC 2 compliant infrastructure
- **Pricing:** Available as add-on across all tiers (specific pricing not disclosed publicly)
- **Availability:** Generally available as of 2026
- **Differentiator:** Unlike third-party AI notetakers (Fireflies, Otter, etc.), Wealthbox AI Notetaker is native to the platform - no app-switching, no separate login, seamless CRM integration

### CRM Migration Assistance
**White-Glove Data Migration Service**

- **What it does:** Professional data migration service for switching from legacy CRM systems
- **Key Features:**
  - Dedicated migration specialists
  - Secure data import from various CRM platforms
  - Data mapping and validation
  - Migration project management
  - Post-migration support and training
- **Pricing:** Included with all plans
- **Use Cases:**
  - Switching from Redtail, Junxure, Salesforce
  - Migrating from Advisors Assistant, SmartOffice
  - Moving from generic CRMs to advisor-specific solution

### Enterprise Implementation Program
**Dedicated Onboarding for Large Firms**

- **What it does:** Comprehensive implementation support for enterprise deployments (100+ users)
- **Key Features:**
  - Dedicated account manager
  - Custom implementation plan
  - Firm-wide training programs
  - Integration setup assistance
  - Ongoing strategic support
- **Pricing:** Included with Enterprise tier
- **Availability:** Enterprise customers only

## Integrations

### Integration Overview
- **Total Integrations:** 100+ financial services technology integrations
- **Integration Hub:** Native integrations via Wealthbox API + third-party automation platforms
- **Primary Categories:**
  - Portfolio Management & Reporting
  - Custodial Platforms
  - Financial Planning Software
  - Document Storage
  - Marketing & Client Communication
  - Onboarding & Form Pre-Fill Tools
  - Calendar & Scheduling
  - AI Assistants & Meeting Tools
  - Billing & Payment Solutions
  - Risk Analysis & Behavioral Tools
  - Estate Planning
  - Insurance & Annuity Platforms
  - Compliance Tools
  - Voice Dictation & Communication

### Key Integrations (Detailed Analysis)

#### Orion (Portfolio Management)
- **Type:** Native Integration
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Deep integration with Orion Advisor Technology for portfolio management, planning, and reporting
- **Data synced:** 
  - Contact data from Wealthbox to Orion Planning
  - Account balances and positions from Orion to Wealthbox
  - Client household information
  - Automatic contact linking between platforms
- **Setup complexity:** Medium
  - Requires active Orion subscription
  - OAuth authentication
  - One-time linking of contacts between systems
- **Key capabilities:**
  - View Orion account information directly in Wealthbox contact records
  - "Send To" menu integration - push Wealthbox contacts to Orion to create/update clients
  - Single Sign-On (SSO) from Wealthbox to Orion Planning
  - Automatic bi-directional linking after initial send
  - Real-time balance updates in CRM
- **Limitations:** 
  - Requires Orion subscription (not included)
  - Initial contact matching may require manual linking
  - Some Orion data fields may not map to Wealthbox custom fields
- **Documentation:** Available at https://www.wealthbox.com/integrations/orion/

#### Charles Schwab (Custodian)
- **Type:** Native Custodial Integration
- **Direction:** Bi-directional with account opening workflow
- **What it does:** Schwab Advisor Services integration for account data viewing and digital account opening
- **Data synced:**
  - Account details, positions, and transactions from Schwab to Wealthbox
  - Contact information from Wealthbox to Schwab Advisor Center
  - Account opening data and status
- **Setup complexity:** Medium
  - Requires Schwab Advisor Services access
  - Authentication through Schwab Advisor Center
  - One-time OAuth authorization
- **Key capabilities:**
  - View Schwab account details on Wealthbox contact record pages
  - See positions and transaction history
  - "Send To" menu - push contact data to Schwab Advisor Center
  - Initiate digital account openings directly from Wealthbox
  - Single Sign-On to Schwab platforms
  - Faster, more efficient onboarding process
- **Limitations:**
  - Requires Schwab Advisor Services relationship
  - Account opening subject to Schwab's approval workflows
  - Real-time sync depends on Schwab API availability
- **Documentation:** Available at https://www.wealthbox.com/integrations/charles-schwab/

#### Fidelity Wealthscape (Custodian)
- **Type:** Native Custodial Integration
- **Direction:** Bi-directional with digital account opening
- **What it does:** Integration with Fidelity's Wealthscape platform for custody and clearing
- **Data synced:**
  - Client and account information from Wealthbox to Fidelity
  - Account data from Fidelity to Wealthbox (balances, positions)
  - Digital account opening status and tracking
- **Setup complexity:** Medium
  - Requires Fidelity Wealthscape access
  - Authentication through Fidelity's platform
- **Key capabilities:**
  - Send client and account information to Fidelity with few clicks
  - Initiate and track Fidelity digital account openings from Wealthbox
  - Automatically sync Fidelity account data into Wealthbox
  - View key account information within contact records
  - Single Sign-On functionality
  - Reduce manual entry and errors
  - Streamline onboarding and speed to account funding
- **Limitations:**
  - Requires Fidelity Wealthscape relationship
  - Subject to Fidelity's digital account opening eligibility
  - Some account types may require manual processing
- **Documentation:** Available at https://www.wealthbox.com/integrations/fidelity/

#### RightCapital (Financial Planning)
- **Type:** Native Integration with Real-Time Sync
- **Direction:** Bi-directional with automatic sync
- **What it does:** Deep integration with RightCapital financial planning software for workflow synchronization
- **Data synced:**
  - Contact details (names, demographics) from Wealthbox to RightCapital
  - Notes created in RightCapital to Wealthbox contact records
  - Tasks created in RightCapital to Wealthbox task lists
  - Planning status and progress updates
- **Setup complexity:** Easy to Medium
  - Simple one-click contact data transfer
  - Automatic authentication once connected
- **Key capabilities:**
  - Single Sign-On from Wealthbox to RightCapital
  - Send contact information with one button click
  - Real-time sync of notes and tasks from RightCapital to Wealthbox
  - Centralized view of client activity across both platforms
  - Automatic updates reflected immediately
  - Improved team collaboration with unified task visibility
  - Eliminates manual data re-entry
- **Limitations:**
  - Requires active RightCapital subscription
  - Contact matching may require initial linking
  - Some custom fields may not sync automatically
- **Documentation:** Available at https://www.wealthbox.com/integrations/rightcapital/
- **Standout Feature:** Real-time bidirectional sync of notes and tasks makes this one of Wealthbox's most sophisticated planning integrations

#### Tamarac (Portfolio Management)
- **Type:** Native Integration
- **Direction:** One-way (Tamarac to Wealthbox)
- **What it does:** Envestnet | Tamarac portfolio rebalancing and performance reporting integration
- **Data synced:**
  - Account details, account types, descriptions
  - Account addresses and contact information
  - Holdings and positions
  - Billing information
  - Custom fields configured in Tamarac
- **Setup complexity:** Medium
  - Requires Tamarac subscription and API access
  - Contact linking between platforms
- **Key capabilities:**
  - View Tamarac accounts and balances directly in Wealthbox contact records
  - See account type, description, and address details
  - Access positions, billing, and custom field data
  - Consolidated client view across CRM and portfolio management
  - Single location for client relationship and investment data
- **Limitations:**
  - One-way sync only (view Tamarac data in Wealthbox, cannot push back)
  - Requires active Tamarac subscription
  - Custom field mapping may require configuration
  - Real-time updates depend on Tamarac API sync frequency
- **Documentation:** Available at https://www.wealthbox.com/integrations/tamarac/

#### Black Diamond (Portfolio Management)
- **Type:** Native Integration
- **Direction:** One-way (Black Diamond to Wealthbox)
- **What it does:** Black Diamond Wealth Platform integration for comprehensive portfolio data access
- **Data synced:**
  - Client information from reconciled accounts
  - Account summaries and balances
  - Holdings and positions
  - Transaction history
- **Setup complexity:** Medium
  - Requires Black Diamond subscription
  - Account reconciliation must be complete
  - Contact mapping between platforms
- **Key capabilities:**
  - View Black Diamond reconciled accounts from Wealthbox contact records
  - Click on account numbers to drill into detailed account information
  - Review account holding summaries
  - Access detailed transaction history
  - Consolidated client financial picture in CRM
  - Guide clients through complete wealth journey with unified data
- **Limitations:**
  - One-way sync (view only in Wealthbox)
  - Only shows reconciled accounts (non-reconciled accounts not visible)
  - Requires active Black Diamond subscription
  - Data refresh frequency determined by Black Diamond sync schedule
- **Documentation:** Available at https://www.wealthbox.com/integrations/black-diamond/

#### eMoney Advisor (Financial Planning)
- **Type:** Native Integration with SSO
- **Direction:** Primarily one-way (account lookup)
- **What it does:** Integration with eMoney's comprehensive financial planning platform
- **Data synced:**
  - Client data accessible for account lookup
  - Basic client matching between systems
- **Setup complexity:** Easy
  - Simple account lookup and SSO setup
- **Key capabilities:**
  - Access Wealthbox data from eMoney for easy account lookup
  - Single Sign-On between platforms
  - Quick client identification and matching
  - Supports independent advisors and enterprise implementations
- **Limitations:**
  - Less robust than RightCapital integration (no automatic note/task sync)
  - Requires eMoney subscription
  - Limited bidirectional sync capabilities
  - Primarily focused on SSO and lookup rather than data synchronization
- **Documentation:** Available at https://www.wealthbox.com/integrations/emoney/
- **Note:** Integration appears lighter-weight compared to RightCapital; primarily SSO and lookup functionality

### Integration Types Available
- **Native Integrations:** Direct platform-to-platform connections (most portfolio management, custodians, planning tools)
- **API Integrations:** Custom integrations via Wealthbox API (requires partnership agreement)
- **Third-Party Automation Platforms:** 
  - Zapier (2,000+ app integrations)
  - Integrately (1,000+ app integrations)
  - Make/Integromat (650+ app integrations)
- **Webhooks:** Available through Wealthbox API (partnership required for access)
- **Chrome Extension:** Gmail integration for embedded CRM functionality
- **Send-To Actions:** Push data from Wealthbox to integrated applications with one click

### Integration Categories

The integrations page lists 100+ integrations across these categories:
- **Portfolio Management:** Addepar, AdviceCloud, AssetBook, Black Diamond, Blueleaf, BridgeFT, Broadridge, Capitect, CircleBlack, Deepvest, FiSpoke, Flourish, Invent, Investipal, Max, Milemarker, Morningstar Office, Orion, Panoramix, SmartData, Tamarac, Turnqey, Wove

- **Calendar & Scheduling:** Apple Calendar, Calendly, FreeBusy, Google Calendar, GoToMeeting, Greminders, iCalendar, OncHub, Outlook Calendar, YouCanBook.Me
- **Communication Tools:** CurrentClient, Econiq, Fynancial, Google Mail (Gmail), Intulse, Knudge, Lightspeed Voice, MyRepChat, Outlook Email, Qwil Messenger, RingCentral, Simplii, Slack, Smith.ai, Twilio, Yext Relate
- **Billing & Payment:** AdvicePay, Smart Kx
- **Risk Analysis & Behavioral Tools:** Andes, Atlas Point, DataPoints, Nitrogen, RiXtrema, Stratifi, Tolerisk
- **Estate Planning:** Estately, Trust & Will, Wealth.com, Yourefolio
- **Insurance & Annuities:** Annuities Genius, BackNine, White Swan
- **Voice Dictation:** Copytalk, Mobile Assistant
- **Compliance:** Comply
- **Other Productivity:** Asana, Hubly, Strety (EOSÂ® To-Do sync), Flextract (document extraction)

**Note:** Complete integration specifications and technical details for most integrations not publicly documented - appears to be available to active customers and integration partners. Over 100 integrations represents one of the most comprehensive integration catalogs in advisor CRM space.

## API & Developer Info

### API Availability
- **API Available:** Yes - Wealthbox provides API for integration partners
- **API Documentation:** Not publicly accessible (requires partnership agreement)
- **Developer Portal:** No public developer portal found
- **Webhooks:** Likely supported but not documented publicly

### Developer Access
- **Public API Docs:** Not available - requires partnership
- **Rate Limits:** Not documented publicly
- **Authentication:** Not documented publicly (likely OAuth based on integration descriptions)
- **SDKs/Libraries:** Not documented publicly

### Partnership Requirements
Wealthbox offers three partnership tiers (from /partnerships page):

1. **Integration and Marketing Partnership**
   - Develop around Wealthbox API
   - Provide integration benefiting mutual users
   - Co-marketing opportunities (joint webinars, blog posts, partner page listing)
   - Promote integration to each company's user base

2. **Integration-Only Partnership**
   - Build to Wealthbox API
   - No co-marketing requirement
   - Suitable for internal firm use
   - Not for resale or sharing with other advisors

3. **Marketing-Only Partnership**
   - Co-marketing without technical integration
   - Partner logo on Wealthbox Partners page
   - Collaborative marketing opportunities

### Documentation Quality
- **Public Documentation:** Limited to marketing content and integration overviews
- **User Documentation:** Appears comprehensive based on "Knowledge Base" and help references, but behind login wall
- **Support Access:** Help desk mentioned but not publicly accessible (likely requires account)
- **Training Resources:** 
  - Video tutorial library mentioned
  - Knowledge Base Q&A
  - Live Help support
  - CRM migration assistance

**Research Note:** API documentation and technical specifications are restricted to integration partners. Unlike some open API platforms, Wealthbox appears to control API access through formal partnership agreements. This approach ensures quality integrations but creates barrier for custom development evaluation. Firms interested in custom integrations or technical API details must engage Wealthbox partnership team.

- **Security Issues:** security@wealthbox.com

- **Demo Booking:** Enterprise demo at https://www.wealthbox.com/demo/enterprise/

### Response Time
- **SLA:** Not specified publicly
- **Priority Enterprise Support:** Available for Enterprise tier customers
- **Live Help:** Real-time support during business hours for customers

  - Ongoing strategic support

  - Features overview
  - Productivity spotlight (AI notes, workflows, integrations)
  - Integration show-and-tell
  - CRM data migration process
  - Q&A session
- **Blog:** Not prominently featured (likely exists but not primary marketing channel)
- **Webinars:** Available through partnerships and co-marketing initiatives
- **Enterprise Demo Program:** Dedicated for large firm implementations (100+ users)

  - CRM migration assistance (included)

  - Firm-wide training programs
  - Custom implementation plans
  - Dedicated account manager
  - Ongoing strategic support

### Migration Support
- **White-Glove Migration Service:**
  - Free for all customers
  - Dedicated migration specialists
  - Secure data import from legacy systems
  - Support for: Redtail, Junxure, Salesforce, Advisors Assistant, SmartOffice, and other CRM platforms
  - Data validation and verification
  - Post-migration training and support
  - "Ease and speed" of switching emphasized in marketing

## Evaluation Notes

### Pros
- **Modern User Experience:** Contemporary interface design praised for intuitiveness; reflects consumerization of B2B software; designed with modern development practices
- **Native AI Notetaker:** Embedded AI meeting documentation without separate login/integration (competitive differentiator vs. Fireflies/Otter integrations)
- **Comprehensive Integrations:** 100+ financial services integrations including major custodians (Schwab, Fidelity, LPL), portfolio platforms (Orion, Tamarac, Black Diamond), and planning tools (RightCapital, eMoney, MoneyGuide)
- **Workflow Automation:** Sophisticated workflow engine with conditional logic, milestones, subtasks, and form builders for process standardization
- **Two-Way Email Sync:** Seamless Gmail and Outlook integration with email-to-CRM actions (create tasks, events, workflows directly from email)
- **Strong Security Posture:** SOC 2 Type II compliant, bank-level encryption, AWS infrastructure (ISO 27001 certified), 2FA, session controls, nightly backups
- **Free Migration Service:** White-glove CRM data migration included with all plans - removes barrier to switching
- **Real-Time Integration Sync:** RightCapital integration syncs notes and tasks in real-time (superior to many competitor integrations)
- **Digital Account Opening:** Direct account opening workflows with Schwab and Fidelity from within CRM
- **14-Day Free Trial:** No credit card required; full platform access to evaluate before purchase
- **Flexible Automation:** Zapier (2,000+ apps), Integrately (1,000+ apps), Make/Integromat (650+ apps) for custom workflows
- **Enterprise-Grade Features:** SSO, VPN support, on-premise Exchange sync, SFTP backups, role-based access, org-wide security controls
- **Collaborative Design:** Shared email accounts, team workspaces, coworker notifications, role-based permissions
- **Advanced Reporting:** AI-powered report generation, customizable dashboards, charts/graphs, dynamic report engine with multiple criteria
- **Independent Company:** Owned by Starburst Labs (not owned by Orion or other portfolio management vendor) - no inherent conflicts

### Cons
- **No Public Pricing:** Zero transparency on costs; requires sales engagement to get quotes; impossible to budget without demo
- **AI Notetaker Add-On Cost:** Core differentiating feature requires additional paid add-on (not included in base pricing)
- **Limited API Access:** API documentation not public; requires formal partnership agreement; barrier for custom development
- **Storage Limits:** File storage capped by tier (2GB/5GB/10GB/20GB) vs. unlimited storage in some competitors
- **No Native Compliant Texting:** Unlike Redtail Speak, Wealthbox lacks built-in compliant SMS solution (relies on third-party integrations like MyRepChat, Qwil)
- **Integration Documentation Gaps:** Most integration pages provide high-level overviews only; detailed technical specs not publicly available
- **Starter Plan Very Limited:** Only 1 opportunity pipeline, 3 contact roles, 3 teams - quickly outgrown by small growing firms
- **Some One-Way Integrations:** Tamarac and Black Diamond integrations are view-only (cannot push data back from Wealthbox)
- **Pricing Positioning:** Lack of public pricing suggests premium positioning vs. Redtail's transparent $39-65/user/month
- **Custodian Integration Limitations:** Limited to view/account opening (no deep trading or billing integration like some enterprise CRMs)
- **Support Documentation Access:** Knowledge base and detailed help behind login wall; cannot evaluate support quality before purchase
- **Industry-Specific:** Financial services only - not suitable for other industries (though appropriate for target market)

### Alternatives
- **Redtail CRM:** More transparent pricing ($39-65/user/month), bundled texting (Speak), larger user base (100,000+ advisors), Orion-owned
- **Salesforce Financial Services Cloud:** More customizable, broader ecosystem, steeper learning curve, higher cost, requires admin resources
- **Junxure:** Deep financial services focus, more customization, dated interface, complex setup
- **Practifi:** Modern platform, strong workflow engine, good for RIAs, Australian-founded with US presence
- **Advisors Assistant:** Comprehensive feature set, dated interface, steep learning curve, long-tenured in industry
- **SmartOffice (SS&C):** Enterprise-grade for broker-dealers, complex, expensive, requires significant implementation
- **Wealthbox vs. Redtail:** Wealthbox = modern UX, native AI notetaker, independent; Redtail = transparent pricing, bundled texting, Orion ecosystem, larger user base

### Use Cases

#### Ideal For:
- **Modern-First Advisors:** Firms prioritizing intuitive UX and contemporary design over legacy feature density
- **RIA Firms (5-50+ users):** Independent advisors needing professional CRM without enterprise complexity
- **Firms Prioritizing Integrations:** Practices heavily reliant on custodian (Schwab, Fidelity, LPL) and portfolio management (Orion, Tamarac, Black Diamond) integrations
- **Workflow-Driven Practices:** Teams wanting sophisticated process automation with conditional logic and milestones
- **AI-Forward Advisors:** Firms seeking native AI meeting documentation without app-switching (vs. third-party Fireflies/Otter)
- **Gmail/Outlook Heavy Users:** Practices where email is central workflow hub and two-way sync is critical
- **Growing Firms (Business/Enterprise Tier):** Teams needing unlimited pipelines, roles, teams, and advanced reporting
- **Multi-Office RIAs:** Enterprise tier offers workspaces, role-based access, and centralized administration
- **Firms Switching CRMs:** White-glove migration service lowers risk and effort of transitioning from Redtail/Junxure/Salesforce
- **Teams Using RightCapital:** Real-time note/task sync makes Wealthbox + RightCapital particularly powerful combination
- **Broker-Dealers (Enterprise):** Large firms needing SSO, VPN support, SFTP backups, org-wide security enforcement

#### Not Ideal For:
- **Budget-Conscious Solo Advisors:** No public pricing + AI Notetaker add-on = unknown costs; Redtail's transparent $39-45/user/month may be more suitable
- **Firms Requiring Compliant Texting:** No native SMS solution like Redtail Speak; requires third-party integration (MyRepChat, Qwil) adding cost/complexity
- **Custom Development Teams:** API restricted to formal partners; cannot evaluate API before commitment; Salesforce/Redtail have more open APIs
- **Document-Heavy Practices (Lower Tiers):** 2GB (Starter) or 5GB (Professional) may be insufficient vs. unlimited storage competitors
- **Non-Financial Services:** Platform built specifically for wealth management; not suitable for other industries
- **Firms Needing Trading Integration:** Custodian integrations focus on viewing data and account opening, not deep trading/rebalancing workflows
- **Very Small Teams (<3 users) on Tight Budgets:** Starter plan limitations + likely premium pricing vs. simpler/cheaper alternatives
- **Highly Regulated Broker-Dealers with Complex Compliance:** May need more robust supervision/archiving than Wealthbox offers (SmartOffice, Salesforce FSC may be better)
- **Firms Requiring Maximum Customization:** Less flexible than Salesforce; workflow and field customization has limits
- **Orion-Centric Practices Wanting Ecosystem Bundling:** Redtail (owned by Orion) may offer tighter ecosystem integration and potential pricing benefits

### Key Differentiators
1. **Native Embedded AI Notetaker:** Unlike competitors relying on third-party AI tools (Fireflies, Otter.ai), Wealthbox AI Notetaker is built directly into the Meetings feature - no separate login, no app switching, seamless CRM integration with automatic task generation and follow-up emails
2. **Modern User Experience Design:** Purpose-built with contemporary UI/UX reflecting consumerization of B2B software; consistently praised for intuitive interface; stark contrast to legacy CRMs (Junxure, Advisors Assistant, older Redtail interface)
3. **Real-Time Bidirectional Integration Sync:** RightCapital integration syncs notes and tasks in real-time between platforms (not just data push); superior to batch/scheduled sync models used by most CRM integrations
4. **Independent Ownership (No Ecosystem Conflict):** Owned by Starburst Labs, not portfolio management vendor (unlike Redtail/Orion, SmartOffice/SS&C); avoids potential conflicts or pressure to use specific portfolio systems
5. **Free White-Glove Migration Service:** CRM data migration assistance included with all plans (not upsell or premium service); removes major barrier to switching from legacy systems; dedicated migration specialists, data validation, post-migration support

## Research Methodology Notes

**Sources Accessed:**
- Primary website (wealthbox.com) - all publicly accessible pages
- Pricing page (feature comparison matrix)
- AI Notetaker product page
- Integrations hub (100+ integration listings)
- Feature-specific pages (Contacts, Workflows, Mail, Meetings, Opportunities, Reports)
- Security page (comprehensive infrastructure and compliance details)
- About Us / Company page
- Partnerships page (API access model)
- Enterprise demo page
- Individual integration detail pages for 7 key integrations (Orion, Schwab, Fidelity, RightCapital, eMoney, Tamarac, Black Diamond)

**Limitations Encountered:**
- **Zero Public Pricing Information:** Unlike Redtail ($39-65/user/month published), Wealthbox requires sales contact for any pricing; cannot estimate costs without demo engagement
- **API Documentation Not Public:** API specs, rate limits, authentication, webhooks not documented; requires formal partnership agreement to access
- **Support/Help Portal Access Restricted:** Knowledge base, detailed help articles, user guides behind login wall (Cloudflare protected)
- **Integration Technical Details Limited:** Most integration pages provide marketing overview only; detailed data mappings, sync frequencies, field specifications not published
- **No Public User Reviews Accessed:** Did not consult G2, Capterra, Software Advice, or other third-party review sites (would provide real user experiences, pain points, satisfaction scores)
- **Support Contact Information Minimal:** No public phone number, helpdesk URL protected, email-only contact for non-customers
- **AI Notetaker Pricing Unknown:** Core differentiating feature pricing not disclosed; add-on cost significant unknown in TCO analysis
- **Comparison Shopping Impossible:** Without pricing, cannot directly compare cost vs. Redtail, Salesforce, Junxure
- **Web Search Unavailable:** Brave API not configured; could not search for third-party reviews, user forums, or external documentation

**Recommended Next Steps for Complete Evaluation:**
1. **Request Pricing Demo:** Contact Wealthbox sales for detailed pricing across all tiers including AI Notetaker add-on; request enterprise volume discounts
2. **Start 14-Day Trial:** Sign up for free trial to access knowledge base, test workflows, evaluate actual user experience and support responsiveness
3. **Interview Current Users:** Speak with 3-5 current Wealthbox users (RIA firms of similar size) about real-world experiences, hidden costs, integration performance
4. **Request API Documentation:** If custom integrations needed, initiate partnership discussion to review API capabilities before commitment
5. **Test Key Integrations in Trial:** Set up and test Schwab/Fidelity custodial integrations, Orion/Tamarac portfolio sync, RightCapital planning sync in trial environment
6. **Consult Third-Party Reviews:** Review G2, Capterra, Software Advice ratings focusing on: ease of use, customer support, value for money, integration quality
7. **Competitive Pricing Analysis:** Once Wealthbox pricing obtained, create TCO comparison vs. Redtail ($39-65/user/month), Salesforce FSC, Junxure over 3-year period
8. **Review G2/Capterra Comparisons:** Examine Wealthbox vs. Redtail head-to-head comparisons on review sites for user-reported differentiators
9. **Migration POC:** Request migration proof-of-concept with sample data export from current CRM to evaluate data mapping quality
10. **Enterprise Reference Calls:** For 100+ user implementations, request reference calls with similar-sized firms about implementation timeline, change management, actual vs. promised capabilities
